snippet: A piano recital by Murray Perahia, displaced by the hurricane, comes to life at Avery Fisher Hall in Lincoln Center, far from the dangling crane boom that canceled his Carnegie Hall performance.
abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews performance by pianist Murray Perahia at Avery Fisher Hall.
lead_paragraph: A piano recital by Murray Perahia, displaced by the hurricane, comes to life at Avery Fisher Hall in Lincoln Center, far from the dangling crane boom that canceled his Carnegie Hall performance.

headline.seo: Murray Perahia Plays at Avery Fisher Hall
headline.main: No Duets for Piano and Crane Boom
headline.print_headline: No Duets for Piano and Crane Boom
